page.title: 02RECREATION IN CONGLETON
page.content: Sunday morning 7am-I was excited,in 4 hours time I was going to my fishing{ {match.}There were 80 people in it and it was very important to me.Time I was dressed.I went down stairs got my{ {fishing}equipment together and cleaned it.I cleaned my rod and put it in the car ready for my dad to take me to the match on the{canal.}I went back to bed .10-30am By this time I was at the match with my rod set up and my bait fresh.11-00am and the whistle blew which allowed me to cast my line into the water and after 10 minutes I got a bite,a roach.I was very pleased.I had a good swim going,one minute to go and I had a bream on,ten seconds to go-I got it out and put it in my keep net just in time.By the time I got in I was very tired.I told my mum I came second and the went to bed.
